participant_1.background:
I'm a pretty short guy, but I make up for it with my big personality.
I love the freedom of being my own boss.
i enjoy budweiser beer.
I'm a meataholic with a furry best friend as my ring bearer.
My favorite TV shows are the ones I can watch with my dog.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy eating fruit with my child when we spend time together.
I grew up with my mother and dogs and now we are close.
i play jazz piano in a band.
I run track for myself.
I need a space where I can be creative and have room for my art supplies.

content.text: Hey! I'm looking for a new friend. Do you want to be friends?
Sure! I'm always looking for new friends.
I like to run track, play jazz piano, and spend time with my dog and child.
Those all sound really fun! I like to watch football, play video games, and hang out with my dog.
That sounds like a good time! I love dogs. What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever. He's the best dog ever.
Golden retrievers are so cute! I love their fluffy fur.
Yeah, they are so soft. I love giving him belly rubs.
Belly rubs are the best! They're so relaxing.
I know, right? I could give my dog belly rubs all day long.
Me too! I think I'm going to go give my dog a belly rub right now.
Have fun! I'll talk to you later.
